data.title: Raul Garcia
data.meta_description: Next Creative Leaders is a portfolio-based competition identifying talented women and non-binary creatives who are stepping into leadership roles, including creative directors, copywriters, and more!
data.text:
Raul is an internationally awarded creative director with over 19 years of experience working for agencies in Toronto, Vancouver, Calgary, New York City, San Francisco and Los Angeles.

Not only has Raul won at every major national and international award show, but his work also has garnered the attention of mainstream media and pop culture. His work has made the front page of the Toronto Star, has been the subject of local news across the globe, has landed on the front page of Reddit (twice), and has been blogged by 50 Cent, Pharrell Williams, and tweeted by Rosario Dawson, and Zoe Kravitz.
